title: Script ID Required
content:
Hi everyone,

If anyone could help me ID this script font I would be most grateful.

Thanks,

Rob

author: roblonuk

comments.content: Seeing three different o’s and two different l‘s I would say this is handdone.
Thank Renko, that explains the difficulty in finding the foundry. Thanks for taking a look.
